relevant_findings.heent: Right ptosis (baseline per family), hypomimic with decreased blink.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Poor inspiratory effort but no r/r/w.
relevant_findings.rectal: Reportedly normal per ED, not repeated on exam.
relevant_findings.extremities: Left > right leg wasting. Left > RUE wasting.

neurological.cranial_nerves: Ptosis on the right, diminished to pin on left hemiface, tongue fasciculations.
neurological.motor: RUE full except 5- IO's. RLE full except 5- IP. LUE no movement. LLE hemiparesis UMN pattern.
neurological.sensory: Touch retained on left side but diminished to pin over the hemibody.
neurological.cerebellar: Some action tremor without dysmetria RUE.
